entry.message:
[DQC.IFRS.0129.9603] It is expected that TreasuryShares with a value of 486,000 reported in the network role http://renta4banco.com/xbrl/2020/roles/PatrimonioNetoResumen should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:TreasurySharesMember and a reported value of 486,000 multiplied by -1. This value appears in the network role http://renta4banco.com/xbrl/2020/roles/EstadoDeCambiosEnElPatrimonioNetoResumen. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:TreasuryShares fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of TreasuryShares : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/213800IMKAUV5KW28586/2020-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/renta4.zip/renta4/reports/renta4banco.xhtml 26373
